text: Granthaprapta lokera aneke kamana kare ye tomadera imana anara pare tomadera abisbase phiriye nite, tadera tarapha theke bidbesera phale tadera kache satya pariskara habara pare'o. Ta'i ksama karo o upeksa karo ye paryanta na allah tamra anusasana niye asena. Nihsandeha allah sabakichura upare sarbasaktimana.
